name: Name
description: Official company name as it appears on the website, cleaned and properly capitalized.

name: Overview
description: Concise company description highlighting core value proposition, main products/services, and target audience (1–2 sentences).

name: Industry
description: Specific industry or sector classification (e.g., "Developer Tools", "SaaS", "Fintech"). Use precise terms rather than broad categories.

name: Headquarters
description: Primary headquarters location with city and state/country (e.g., "San Francisco, CA", "London, UK").

name: Company Size
description: Number of employees or company size range (e.g., "50–200 employees", "1,000+ team members").

name: Recent Funding
description: Latest funding round with amount, stage, date, and lead investors when mentioned (e.g., "Series B $25M led by Acme Ventures in March 2024").

name: Market Presence
description: Geographic markets, regions, or countries where the company operates or serves customers (e.g., "Global", "North America and Europe").
